text: wakhdhna ealaa aldhyn addaeu 'anahum 'atbae almasih eisaa -wlysu kdhlk- aleahd almwkd aldhy akhdhnah ealaa bani 'israyyl: bi'ana yutabeu rasuluhum wynsrwh wywazrwh, fbddalu dynhm, wtrku nsybana mimaa dhukiruu bh, falam yaemaluu bh, kama sune alyhwd, falqyna baynahum aleadawat walbaghda' 'iilaa yawm alqyamt, wasawf yunabiyuhum allah bima kanuu yasnaeun yawm alhsab, wsyeaqbhm ealaa snyehm
